name: PromptSignal
tagline: Monitor your brand’s LLM visibility, and how to improve it
description: PromptSignal tracks how your brand shows up in AI answers. Measure mentions, rank, sentiment & visibility across leading LLMs, see the sources they cite, and get weekly recommendations to boost your presence.

name: Fruitful
tagline: Track competitors instantly. Juicy insights every day.
description: Track competitor websites and capture every change. Get clear weekly reports and Slack alerts on what matters. Spot hiring signals, pricing moves, and product launches in near real time.

name: TimeFly Dev
tagline: Coding activity tracker for developers
description: Deep automatic analytics for devs. Track projects, files, languages, commits, sessions, focus patterns, interruptions, all without touching anything. See your real coding DNA. Boost productivity, justify your work, or just understand how you actually code.

name: nibi
tagline: Run your empire as a freelancer
description: nibi helps freelancers track income, manage expenses, and prepare for taxes with a bilingual interface designed for the Canadian market. Built specifically for solopreneurs who need simple, powerful financial management without the corporate complexity.

name: Sorce
tagline: Swipe right to let AI apply on your behalf
description: When you swipe right on Sorce, AI goes to the company’s website and applies on your behalf, and it writes cover letters automatically. People have swiped more than 20 million times on Sorce and have landed jobs at companies like Anduril, Lyft, & Autodesk.

name: TrueWellness
tagline: Personalized health & wellness built around you
description: TrueWellness is an agentic system that understands the full context of your body- continuously learning from you to deliver precise, personalized guidance in real time.

name: Saveclip
tagline: The clip camera that remembers your life
description: Saveclip captures what you see without audio and makes memories searchable.

name: Ascend.io
tagline: Advanced AI for building & running agentic data & workflows
description: Meet Otto, your AI data teammate 🐐 — the agent that builds, monitors & fixes your data workflows. From pipeline health to schema evolution, Otto helps you ship data products in hours, not weeks.

name: Nook
tagline: Fast, focused, and open — a new WebKit browser for Mac
description: Nook Browser is a new open-source arc alternative. We truly care about our users and we're trying to make the browser experience as seamless as we can.

name: Ovesio
tagline: Scale E-Commerce Globally With Multilingual AI
description: Translate Your Store With 10,000+ SKUs Into 29+ Languages In Hours. No descriptions? Oveso will write them for you, and also generate Multilingual SEO tags. Build and Optimized for E-Commerce Scaling.

name: DoDoo
tagline: Make productivity fun, grow a pet, and stay accountable
description: DoDoo makes productivity fun and social. AI helps you break goals into mini tasks. Complete tasks to grow and level up your digital pet, earn rewards, and stay consistent. Team up with friends, track progress together, and keep each other accountable.

name: Timestripe Magazine
tagline: Productivity content that doesn't expire tomorrow
description: Slow media in old internet style exploring productivity beyond quick hacks. We dig into how to build plans and achieve goals not through hustle culture, but through joy and calm. Deep insights for thoughtful professionals.

name: Flight Mail
tagline: Send more, spend less!
description: Most email tools charge you per contact, not per email. For agencies and small businesses, that’s not just unfair, it’s expensive. Flight Mail changes that. You pay one low monthly fee and send 50,000 emails. No hidden limits. No overcomplicated features.

name: ByDesign – Design Your Best Life
tagline: Productivity + Learning + Auto-Scheduling
description: ByDesign is the all-in-one app that helps you shape your future, not just your to-do list. It brings together tasks, goals, notes, calendars, and learning in one seamless space—powered by auto-scheduling that adapts to you.

name: AI Spaces
tagline: Reddit for AI tools
description: AI Spaces is like Reddit for AI tools. A community-driven platform to find and compare the best AI tools, based on real user reviews and expert recommendations.

name: SupaRedd
tagline: Get Customers from Reddit with Human-like AI
description: Reddit Marketing with Power of AI. SupaRedd finds the best subreddits and hottest posts, then helps you promote your product naturally with human-like AI. From discovery to engagement, our AI handles everything while you focus on growing your business.

name: Teambridge AI
tagline: AI for the people who keep the world running
description: Today Teambridge launches a suite of AI products revolutionizing how the most dynamic and complex workforces are managed. This is real-world AI built for action, and it's how teams will get work done at unprecedented scale and pace.

name: Calendar0
tagline: Type. Schedule. Done.
description: Calendar0 is a system tray app with AI scheduling. Type "lunch with Sarah tomorrow": it finds her email, checks availability, books it. One-click calendar access. One-click meeting join. No more browser tab chaos.

name: Fluffle
tagline: I see ya, Focus — the AI social workspace.
description: Remote work brings flexibility but also challenges: isolation and fragmented focus, especially for ADHD. Meet Fluffle, not just another productivity app — your ambient, lightweight, and social desktop pet. Helping you feel present and connected while working.

name: RE Referrals
tagline: Real estate agent-to-agent referrals software
description: Close more agent to agent referrals deals. No network required. No fees.

tagline: Monitor your brand’s LLM visibility, and how to improve it
